## Formulario Macroeconomía {.tabset .tabset-pills}

### Contabilidad Nacional

$$Y=C+I+G+XN$$
$$I_t=\Delta K_t+\delta K_t$$
$$PNB=PIB-F$$
$$F=r_pB_p-r_AB_A$$
$$S_p=Y+TR-T-C-F$$
$$S_g=T-TR-G$$

$$S_n=S_p+S_g=Y-G-C-F$$
$$S_e=F-XN$$
$$S=Y-C-G-XN=I$$

$$Deflactor_{PIB}=\frac{Nominal}{Real}=\frac{\sum p_{i,t}\cdot q_{i,t}}{\sum p_{i,0}\cdot q_{i,0}}$$


$$IPC_t=\frac{\sum p_{i,t}\cdot q_{i,0}}{\sum p_{i,0}\cdot q_{i,0}}$$

$$CC=XN-F=-S_e$$
$$TI=\frac{P_x}{P_m}$$

$$TCR=\frac{eP^*}{P}$$

### Consumo

$$Y_{l,t}+rA_t=C_t+T_t+A_{t+1}-A_t$$
$$\sum_{i=0}^{\infty} \frac{C_{t+i}}{(1+r)^i}=\sum_{i=0}^N \frac{Y_{l,t+i}-T_{t+i}}{(1+r_i)^i}+(1+r)A_t$$

$$\overline{C}=r \left[A_t+\sum_{i=0}^N \frac{Y_{l,t+i}-T_{t+i}}{(1+r_i)^{i+1}} \right]$$

### Monetaria

$$\underbrace{M}_{Oferta \hspace{1mm} Monetaria} \cdot \underbrace{V}_{Velocidad}=\underbrace{P}_{Precios}\cdot \underbrace{Y}_{Producto}$$

$$\underbrace{M}_{Oferta \hspace{1mm} Monetaria}=\underbrace{\left(\frac{1+\overline{C}}{\theta+ \overline{C}}\right)}_{Multiplicador}\cdot \underbrace{H}_{Emisión}$$


### Fiscal

$$d_t=-b_t \left(\frac{r-g}{1+g}\right)$$


### Modelos

Salarios de Eficiencia, Shapiro-Stiglitz
$$\rho V_e=(w-e)-b(V_e-V_u)$$

$$\rho V_s=w-(b+q)(V_s-V_u)$$
$$\rho V_u=a(V_e-V_u)$$
$$w^*=e+\left(\rho+\frac{b\overline{L}}{\overline{L}-NL}\right) \frac{e}{q}$$


Modelo de Búsqueda y Emparejamiento

$$rJ=P-w+\lambda(V-J)$$
$$rV=-Pc+q(\theta)(J-V)$$
$$rW=w+\lambda(U-W)$$
$$rU=z+\theta q(\theta)(W-U)$$
$$u=\frac{\lambda}{\lambda+\theta q(\theta)}$$
$$w=P-\frac{(r+\lambda)Pc}{q(\theta)}$$

$$w=(1-\beta)z+\beta(P+C\theta)$$
